venn.optim
Class EvolutionaryOptimizerV1

java.lang.Object
  venn.optim.AbstractOptimizer
      venn.optim.EvolutionaryOptimizerV1
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOptimizer
public class EvolutionaryOptimizerV1
extends AbstractOptimizer

Original version of the evolutionary optimizer. A generation consists of a number of individuals and provides mutation, selection, and replication.

Author:
muellera

Nested Class Summary

          Represents a single solution in the optimization space.
